name: Fortigate 6.x Content Pack for graylog3
summary: Contain Syslog UDP Input, Dashboard, Streams, and Extractors

parameters.name: fghostname
parameters.title: Fortigate Host Name
parameters.description: Enter hostname as it appears in system information eg. \"FG123456789\"  This will be used to filter the streams

parameters.name: syslogport
parameters.title: Syslog Port
parameters.description: Please provide a port number greater than 1024 for use by the input eg. 15514

parameters.name: bindip
parameters.title: Bind IP
parameters.description: Please provide ip address to bind input to.  If unsure leave as 0.0.0.0
